{"id":1803956892,"question_id":4056,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"1Â month","timestamp":1760678524,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"2625 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1803956892/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Longest Balanced Substring II","memory":"453.7 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    struct TupleHash {\n        size_t operator()(const std::tuple<int, int, int>& t) const {\n            size_t h1 = std::hash<int>{}(std::get<0>(t));\n            size_t h2 = std::hash<int>{}(std::get<1>(t));\n            size_t h3 = std::hash<int>{}(std::get<2>(t));\n            return h1 ^ (h2 << 1) ^ (h3 << 2); \n        }\n    };\n    const static int MX = 8;\n    \n    int longestBalanced(string s) {\n        int N = (int)s.size();\n        unordered_map<tuple<int, int, int>, int, TupleHash> m[MX];\n        for (int i=0; i<MX; i++)\n            m[i][{0,0,0}] = -1;\n\n        int a = 0, b = 0, c = 0;\n        int ans = 0;\n        \n        for (int i=0; i<N; i++) {\n            if (s[i] == 'a') a++;\n            if (s[i] == 'b') b++;\n            if (s[i] == 'c') c++;\n\n            for (int k=1; k<8; k++) {\n                bool doA = (k & 1); \n                bool doB = (k & 2);\n                bool doC = (k & 4);\n\n                int mn = min({(doA ? a : INT_MAX), (doB ? b : INT_MAX), (doC ? c : INT_MAX)});\n                auto key = make_tuple(\n                    doA ? a - mn : -a,\n                    doB ? b - mn : -b,\n                    doC ? c - mn : -c\n                );\n\n                if (m[k].count(key)) \n                    ans = max(ans, i - m[k][key]);\n                else \n                    m[k][key] = i;\n            }\n        }\n        return ans;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"longest-balanced-substring-ii","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1,"frontend_id":1273}
